title: [FIXED] Problem with End of Game Gifting
body:
Summoners,

We have seen issues with End of Game Gifting tonight and are investigating at this time. If you have experienced any issues with this feature, please respond to this thread. I will update you all when we have more info to share.

Thank you,
Riot Cochese

______________________________________

15/04 10:21am AEST - We identified a faulty piece of hardware and corrected it. End of Game Gifting is now working again, and sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
